1085988920096043009.text:
Beethoven's Fifth starts as "ba ba ba buuum". 
"ba ba ba buuuum" is "dot dot dot dash" in Morse code. 
"dot dot dot dash" is the letter "V" in English.
"V" is the Roman Numeral "5".

Hence, Beethoven's fifth.

11² + 23² + 37² = 2019

17² + 19² + 37² = 2019

23² + 23² + 31² = 2019

After looking at what MTA-STS would entail for our network:

1: For inbound mail an additional TLS cert + web page.

2: For outbound the mail server needs to connect https to any arbitrary address, retrieve a policy file, and parse it. 

#1 is possible, #2 not going to happen.

Winning command is “ntpdate -o 4 http://2.us.pool.ntp.org ”
